DOC.brief_summary: Pinhole glass use pinhole effect may induce functional change eye , include Distance near visual acuity ( DVA , NVA ) , Pupil size , DOF , Accomodative amplitude , CS , Visual field ( VF ) , Stereopsis .
DOC.criteria: Age : 20 50 year old Visual acuity : correctable distant near visual acuity glass 20/20 Others : Normal intraocular pressure , optic disc healthy appearance , normal ocular alignment . History systemic topical medication might affect accommodation Others : Corneal pathologic feature , previous ocular surgery , glaucomatous optic disc , glaucoma , cataract grade II great , vitreous opacity , retinal abnormality might limit accuracy test .
